description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Tracts relative to the Island of St. Helena; written during a residence of five years ... Illustrated with views engraved by Mr. William Daniell, from the drawings of Samuel Davis" Author: BEATSON, Alexander. Contributor: Daniell, William Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 981.i.10", "British Library HMNTS 148.d.1." Page: 233 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1816 Publisher: G. & W. Nicol; J. Booth Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000239740 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
